```{r setup}
library(SAMGEP)
library(pROC)
```


```{r}
samgep_result <- with(
  simdata, samgep(dat_train=trainSet, dat_test=testSet, Cindices=6:160,
                  V=embeddings, observed=unique(trainSet$ID)[1:50], nCores=1))
```


```{r, message=FALSE}
idx <- which(simulated$testSet$ID %in% 101:1000)
samgep_auc <- pROC::auc(simdata$testSet$Y[idx], samgep_result$margMix[idx])
mgpsup_auc <- pROC::auc(simdata$testSet$Y[idx], samgep_result$margSup[idx])
mgpsemisup_auc <- pROCauc(simdata$testSet$Y[idx], samgep_result$margSemisup[idx])
```


```{r}
print(paste('AUCs:',samgep_auc,mgpsup_auc,mgpsemisup_auc))
```
